programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred visits the North East, a region rich in transport history, to explore the development of Britains railways, from the first steam locomotives to the record-breaking Mallard. A visit to Yorks National Railway Museum offers the chance to ride a replica of Stephensons Rocket, while at Ffestiniog Railway he learns about the computer-aided design process used for new locomotives

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Thanks to the advent of rail, moving produce around at speed suddenly became possible, allowing fresh meat, wet fish, dairy, fruit and vegetables to be widely available. With a new system of rapid transport it was now possible for London to enjoy food supplies from all corners of the nation. As Liz McIvor reveals, Victorian men and women developed a taste for one particular dish that would be popular with the masses for generations to come - fish and chips

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom and Barbara make a small profit and spend the money on a loom, while Margo persuades Jerry to buy her a spinning wheel. Self-sufficiency comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: On his arrival at Number 10, Jim Hacker is confronted by a confusing nuclear deterrent problem, made more difficult by Sir Humphreys constant meddling. The new PM soon realises his powers do not stretch to domestic affairs. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Henry VIII: Patron or Plunderer?
programme.desc: Part one of two. Historian Jonathan Foyle examines the often contradictory character of the Tudor monarch. Henry ordered the killing of writers and the demolition of ancient monasteries during his reign, yet was a cultured man who brought the Renaissance to England with a major building programme, tapestry collection and genuine love of the arts

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: Following small-town librarians in Granbury, Texas, who have found themselves at the center of a large-scale movement to defend intellectual freedom of information. Theyre fighting against legislative book bans in their hometown

programme.title: The Making of Spain
programme.desc: Simon Sebag Montefiore explores the history of Spain, beginning with the countrys early years, when Iberia was a minor province of Carthage - then the most coveted of Romes colonies - through to Spains Muslim age and the Cordoba Caliphate

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred visits the North East, a region rich in transport history, to explore the development of Britains railways, from the first steam locomotives to the record-breaking Mallard. programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation

As Liz McIvor reveals, Victorian men and women developed a taste for one particular dish that would be popular with the masses for generations to come - fish and chips

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: Following small-town librarians in Granbury, Texas, who have found themselves at the center of a large-scale movement to defend intellectual freedom of information. Theyre fighting against legislative book bans in their hometown

programme.title: Henry VIII: Patron or Plunderer?
programme.desc: Part one of two. Historian Jonathan Foyle examines the often contradictory character of the Tudor monarch. Henry ordered the killing of writers and the demolition of ancient monasteries during his reign, yet was a cultured man who brought the Renaissance to England with a major building programme, tapestry collection and genuine love of the arts

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack recalls the golden age of shipbuilding, examining the skills of engineers who turned Britain into one of the leading manufacturing nations, and visits Bristol to pay tribute to his personal hero Isambard Kingdom Brunel. He also travels to Scotland for a voyage on the paddle steamer Waverley

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor presents a documentary examining class divisions on trains, with separate carriages for first, second and third class passengers. Over time, trains acted as a catalyst, with people travelling to regions and places for the first time, as well as changing the nations relationship with royalty and developing a stronger sense of shared identity and culture

programme.title: Tutankhamun: The Truth Uncovered
programme.desc: What killed Tutankhamun? Ever since the tomb of the boy king was discovered in 1922, he has become arguably the most famous pharaoh of all ancient Egypt. But his mysterious death at just 19 years of age has never been explained. Now, Dallas Campbell reveals new scientific research aimed at getting to the truth. A CT scan of the pharaohs mummified body creates a full-size image of the real Tutankhamun, while DNA analysis uncovers a shocking secret about his family background - and the genetic trail leads to a revolutionary new theory about his sudden and unexpected death

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: Margaret Thatchers victory in the 1979 general election propels her into power as Britains first female prime minister, but her first two years are characterised by disruption and division. Her first cabinet is split between a small group aligned with her plans for radical change, but the majority are experienced ministers who prefer a more consensual style of politics. She also has to deal with an economy in deep trouble, with inflation rising, unemployment spiralling and public spending growing

programme.title: William Nicholson Remembers - Sweet As You Are
programme.desc: Acclaimed screenwriter William Nicholson looks back on the BBC drama he still considers one of his finest achievements, 1985s As Sweet As You Are. With extracts from the diaries he wrote throughout the production, Nicholson shares how he was inspired to tackle the subject matter. He explains how his research saw him undergoing his own AIDS test, an experience that confirmed for him that this was a story that needed to be told

programme.title: Screen Two
programme.desc: A married lecturer discovers he is HIV-positive after an extra-marital one night stand. After he tells his wife, she is forced to cope with his infidelity and the fact he has put her in danger of contracting the virus herself. Drama, starring Liam Neeson and Miranda Richardson

programme.title: Ardal OHanlon: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: The actor explores some of the most important archaeological finds in Irelands history, revealing how many have been used as an important tool for nation-building on both sides of the border. Speaking to world-renowned experts, he unravels a forgotten time period, when a team of Americans from Harvard University, a Nazi archaeologist from Austria, and a Welsh geography professor dug up ancient sites across the country. Their pioneering work answered questions about the Celts, and what it means to be Irish

programme.title: How to Get Ahead
programme.desc: Documentary in which writer and broadcaster Stephen Smith finds out what it took to survive and prosper in the most artistic and decadent royal courts in history. He begins with Richard II, who cultivated the first truly artistic court in England. Painters, sculptors, poets, tailors, weavers and builders flocked there to make their fortunes, but these were dangerous times, and getting close to Richard brought many to a sticky end. Featuring contributions by David Tennant and Clarissa Dickson-Wright

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack recalls the golden age of shipbuilding, examining the skills of engineers who turned Britain into one of the leading manufacturing nations, and visits Bristol to pay tribute to his personal hero Isambard Kingdom Brunel. He also travels to Scotland for a voyage on the paddle steamer Waverley

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Steph McGovern present the case of a rapist who dressed as a paramedic to gain the trust of his victims, and ask for viewers help to solve an armed robbery at a newsagents in Lincolnshire

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts, Dion Dublin and Martel Maxwell follow the progress of a Victorian farmhouse in Stenson Fields, Derby, and properties in Beckenham in London and Carlisle

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: The work of trackers using hi-tech methods to hunt down stolen vehicles. Richard races to find a stolen Audi before its dismantled. According to the vehicles tracker, its being stored in a garage in Newport, south Wales. At Felixstowe port, stolen vehicle examiner Adam discovers a shipping container crammed full of stolen car parts. His job is to piece together the parts and identify the stolen vehicles, one by one

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden meets her match as she aims to turn the dark second bedroom into a country chic boudoir, inspired by the Tuscan sunrise. To help bring her vision to life, local friends Luca and Alessandro invite her and co-renovator Alan Carr to visit their recently renovated 19th-century farmhouse to gather inspiration. Keen to create a piece de resistance, Amanda ropes in Scott to build a bespoke headboard and takes her first steps into the world of upholstery. Meanwhile, Alan secretly signs up to a painting masterclass with local artist Tony to surprise Amanda with a showpiece of his own

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A London couple who want a less hectic lifestyle ask for Steve Browns help to find a peaceful paradise in Yorkshire on a budget of £425,000. Steve also pays a visit to the North York Moors National Park to find out about the work being done to ensure the park is accessible to everyone

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A school clock gifted by Florence Nightingale is revived, including a full facelift, and a special saxophone receives the utmost care from the team

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Trevor Nelson co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize

programme.desc: Alex Jones and Lauren Laverne present another mix of nationwide reports and live studio-based chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Callum is forced to admit the truth, George inadvertently makes a situation worse, Teddy opts for a risky decision

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.desc: Teddy has made it through the crucial post-operative phase and is allowed to come home from the vet. With an already hectic work and home life, how will Stacey and Joe adapt to caring for a poorly pooch? Joe arrives back home, only to be left with a long list of jobs by Stacey, who also has a new beehive. But the most exciting thing are the Baftas, for which Stacey has been nominated in two categories. Will she be bringing any trophies back to Pickle Cottage?

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne reaches breaking point as he struggles to cope with accumulating pressures. Stella finds it hard to separate the personal from the professional as she makes a ruthless decision in the wake of last weeks devastating events. Corals high hopes of a job-share are quickly dashed when Nishas actions leave her in the lurch

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.sub-title: Why Are We Not Welcome? - Spotlight
programme.desc: This summer, a wave of racist and sectarian violence in North Belfast, Ballymena and beyond forced people out of their homes into an uncertain future. Conor Spackman speaks to some of those who had to flee and one woman who says she and her children will be staying put

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: The staff and students swap the school for the estate as a community clean?up brings back familiar faces - though not everything goes to plan when some cave in to temptation. Desperation drives Schuey back to his criminal past, with disastrous consequences for Mike, and Noel is left reeling from a revelation by Stace

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A woman quits her teaching job to be a governess for a young heiress who witnessed her parents tragic deaths, and ends up also teaching the girls problematic brother after he is sent home from boarding school. The tutor has some strange, unexplainable experiences in the house and begins to suspect there is more to their story than meets the eye. Modern adaptation of Henry Jamess gothic horror 1898 novella The Turn of the Screw, starring Mackenzie Davis, Finn Wolfhard, Brooklynn Prince and Joely Richardson

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer

programme.desc: Former police officer Neil plays a tense waiting game after tracking a Toyota Hilux stolen from outside Aston Villas football ground on match day

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Alan Carr aims to transform the medieval tower room into a movie theatre inspired by Cinema Paradiso, while co-renovator Amanda Holden tries to turn the damp-ridden cellar carved out of the mountains rockface into a wine grotto. Hitting a brick wall with their ideas, Alan takes Amanda to the Guicciardini Strozzi Casona winery to sample their world-famous beverages. Later, Alan gets to work creating a bespoke seating area, giving the entrance hall a much-needed makeover. Amanda builds a path to access the cellar, but discovers the rocky floor acts as a drain for water overflowing from the mountain

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A couple hope their £400,000 budget will buy them a slice of rural bliss in Moray in Scotland, where Jules Hudson is eager to show them the very best property on offer. Jules also chats to some of the residents of an award-winning village recognised as a world leader for sustainable and holistic community living

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Painting conservator Lucia Scalisi uses her skills to honour a racing legend, and a mechanical doll needs the expert skills of toy restorers Julie Tatchell and Amanda Middleditch

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: After yesterdays finalists moved on, two fresh faces enter the Inner Circle, ready to shake things up and make their mark. Only two will make it to the dramatic final, where they face the ultimate showdown: split or shaft? Will they choose to split their combined prize money, or will one player attempt to take it all, leaving the other with nothing? Quiz show, hosted by Amanda Holden

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic comedy based on the turbo-charged PlayStation video game franchise. In the future, cyberterrorism has devastated entire continents and survivors of the technological meltdown create walled fortresses to protect from lawlessness and further attacks. Couriers known as milkmen drive their souped-up cars across danger-filled wastelands to ferry goods between the citadels. One milkman, John Doe, accepts an assignment from New San Franciscos chief operating officer Raven to collect a valuable consignment from New Chicago. If successful, John will be granted citizenship. The mission takes John though Las Vegas where he encounters resourceful car thief Quiet. They joins forces to outrun a psychopathic clown named Sweet Tooth, who controls the desert strip

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John finds his mission thwarted by two unpredictable adversaries in Lost Vegas. Agent Stone recruits new members for his cause

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Biopic of country singer Johnny Cash. Traumatised by the death of his brother as a child and scorned by his father, Cash leaves Arkansas to serve in the US Air Force in Germany, where he starts to write songs. Although reaching a high point in his career touring alongside Elvis and Jerry Lee Lewis, he descends into drink and drug addiction, while fellow singer and future wife June Carter seems to be the only person standing between him and self-destruction. With Joaquin Phoenix and an Oscar-winning Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: On a Bradford estate, Lenny and Mullet find an abandoned car and turn it into a DIY spaceship. Elif Riley, Logan Ludbrook, Lucy Francis and Hayley Brown star in this kitchen-sink sci-fi comedy about big dreams, everyday lives and escaping without going anywhere

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan as best friends retreating from reality into a world of movies. However, change is coming to their lives whether they like it or not

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: While Noa attends a taster day for his new job in Bristol, Evie pulls out all the stops for Film Club - theres a lot riding on tonight. Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A special episode of the historical sketch show, featuring all your favourite songs from the series! Sing along with King Alfred about his burnt cakes, or with Henry VIII about his love of reformation - or get down Norman-style with William the Conqueror. With, of course, our host Rattus to guide the way!

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Historical characters and events are explored in sketches and quizzes based on the books by Terry Deary. Comedy talent including Sarah Hadland, Steve Punt and Meera Syal help bring the strange facts, gory battles and crazy inventions to life

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson subjects the Skoda Yeti to a thorough examination, while Richard Hammond charts the evolution of the Porsche 911 by pitting a modern Turbo S cabriolet against its oldest relative the Volkswagen Beetle - and the power of gravity. James May takes the Ariel Atom V8 for a spin on the test track, and comedian John Bishop receives tuition from the Stig before getting behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.desc: Teddy has made it through the crucial post-operative phase and is allowed to come home from the vet. With an already hectic work and home life, how will Stacey and Joe adapt to caring for a poorly pooch? Joe arrives back home, only to be left with a long list of jobs by Stacey, who also has a new beehive. But the most exciting thing are the Baftas, for which Stacey has been nominated in two categories. Will she be bringing any trophies back to Pickle Cottage?

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne reaches breaking point as he struggles to cope with accumulating pressures. Stella finds it hard to separate the personal from the professional as she makes a ruthless decision in the wake of last weeks devastating events. Corals high hopes of a job-share are quickly dashed when Nishas actions leave her in the lurch

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: The staff and students swap the school for the estate as a community clean?up brings back familiar faces - though not everything goes to plan when some cave in to temptation. Desperation drives Schuey back to his criminal past, with disastrous consequences for Mike, and Noel is left reeling from a revelation by Stace

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Documentary following boxer Tommy Furys return to the ring. Tommy is at his lowest point personally and professionally, living alone in a house that was meant to be his and partner Molly-Maes forever home. His role as a father to baby Bambi brings both joy and pressure as he tries to convince Molly-Mae he is a changed man. After finally getting the medical all-clear to fight again, Tommy and his trainer and father John prepare for his return to the ring against MMA fighter Darren Till. Team Fury travels to the press conference - with John promising to be on his best behaviour

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy prepares for his first gym appearance since announcing his comeback, but with fighter Darren Till throwing threats and chaos into the mix, trainer John pulls Tommy out of the fight claiming he is unwilling to risk his sons future career. Its a crushing blow for Tommy, whos desperate for momentum and purpose. Amid the pressure, theres a flicker of hope - Tommy and partner Molly-Mae Hague are spotted together on New Years Eve, with a kiss that hints at a brighter future

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys fight for redemption continues, but this time, its a battle for his own mind. Struggling to secure a new opponent, he knows a comeback fight is crucial for his mental health. Meanwhile, Molly-Maes new series trailer drops, pushing Tommy to face his own truths in the toughest interview of his life, where he opens up about his battle with alcohol addiction. Back in training, hope returns as a potential fight looms, leading him and his father John to a career-defining meeting

But did the public perception disguise the truth? programme.desc: In north Devon, married couple Frankie and Jason kick off the competition. programme.desc: Sheldons grandmother, known as Meemaw, arrives in Pasadena to visit, but his excitement at her arrival quickly gives way to discomfort when she clashes with Amy. Meanwhile, Raj finds himself drawn to an ambitious female screenwriter he meets at the comic-book store, but Bernadette angrily reminds him he already has a girlfriend. Comedy, guest starring June Squibb

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tensions rise in Graces family, and a row erupts between sisters. Tom and Peri rekindle their teenage romance. And a resident plots revenge

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The village holds a vigil for the serial killers victims, Cleo visits Joel in prison, a hurting mother admits her true feelings, and a resident receives unexpected flattery

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.sub-title: Lido, Anna Vincenzos and Le Bistro

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Two more brave singles take a gamble on love at the altar, but will the new brides high-speed approach prove too much for her laidback groom? Meanwhile, in-laws week continues

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Featuring an attempt to get dressed on a treadmill, a vending machine, a fall into a river and a penalty kick back

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns gets rid of his power plant employees and replaces them all with robots - with the exception of Homer. But trouble soon brews when the mechanised workers develop rebellious tendencies. With the guest voice of Brent Spiner (best known as Star Trek: The Next Generations android Data)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny bond as they miss Leonard, and Howard tries to help Raj get over his break-up with Lucy. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Amy visit an out-of-town biology convention. Comedy about four high-achieving scientists, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard returns from his research expedition in the North Sea and undergoes an adjustment period with Sheldon. Howard experiences an unusual emotional reaction as a result of his relationship with his mother. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire and Gloria hope to spend time with their children outdoors, but their plan backfires. Meanwhile, Phil witnesses an unexpected moment of weakness from Jay. American comedy, starring Julie Bowen, Sofia Vergara and Ty Burrell

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire and Phil swap parenting roles, Gloria falls for a sob story, and Jay helps an overzealous entrepreneur with his dog training scheme. Meanwhile, Mitch finds himself torn between looking after Cam, who is in bed with flu, and attending a Lady Gaga concert. Comedy, directed by The Wonder Years star Fred Savage, featuring Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they decide to take a detour and try to meet one of their idols - Star Wars director George Lucas. Meanwhile, Raj and Amy offer to settle a dispute with a game of table tennis. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard finds out that he has a half-brother, Sheldon and Amy have a platonic sleepover, and Penny gets an offer to audition for a Kevin Smith film. American comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is asked to create a message on the off-chance a Nasa mission discovers alien life, and the guys fight over what he should do. Penny contemplates a return to acting. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon cant get a toy drone to fly. A cancelled flight almost stops Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, while Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Santiago investigate a string of arson attacks that are connected to Santiagos favourite crossword puzzle author. Gina helps Holt improve his Commissioner candidate presentation, while Jeffords, Diaz, Hitchcock and Scully argue over who deserves to get a new detective car

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Boyle realise that they have been fooled into joining a cult-like pyramid scheme and they struggle to terminate their contracts with it. Jeffords, Diaz, Gina and Holt give Santiago advice when she feels the pressure on her first day as a sergeant. US cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Jo Lo Truglio

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer wins a vintage motorcycle and forms his own gang - only to encounter trouble in the form of tough bikers the Hells Satans, who kidnap Marge. Featuring the voices of John Goodman and Henry Winkler

programme.title: The Simpsons

Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Santas Little Helper is thrown out of the house for failing to save Homer from a fire - but goes on to earn a fortune as the new Duff Beer mascot, making him the subject of a bitter ownership battle

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer has his driving licence revoked for being a menace to other road-users, forcing Marge to take charge of the family car and run endless errands for everyone - a responsibility she soon starts to resent. Featuring the guest voices of Steve Busmen and singer-songwriter Jackson Browne

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Modern-day lothario Lewis, 27, arrives at the restaurant with a tried-and-tested plan to charm his way into the affections of 23-year-old flight attendant Megan, while 24-year-old Lee has to hold his own against the sharp humour of 29-year-old Marky. Interactive documentary in which singletons meet up with possible partners from the internet for the first time

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc: Essex couple Claude and Amy, who have a blended family of six children, want to form long-term sexual and emotional relationships with as many partners as possible. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets out on the first leg of a trip from London to Edinburgh aboard the Flying Scotsman, beginning at Kings Cross as he heads for York

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wifes sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Underwater demolition experts embark on a mission to find a safe landing site for the US military to launch an invasion on a South Pacific island occupied by Japanese army and navy forces. But first the commander and his men must put aside their personal differences to ensure the mission is successful. Thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Gary Merrill

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: The Tudor monarch looks back on his tumultuous reign as he lies on his deathbed. He remembers the six women he made his queen, and how the series of unsuccessful marriages impacted on the political state of England and led to the downfall of some of his most trusted allies. Historical drama, starring Keith Michell, Donald Pleasence, Charlotte Rampling and Brian Blessed

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A ruthless cattle baron sets out to create his own private empire, no matter what the cost. When he resorts to murder, he makes an enemy of a civil war veteran, while his lust for power drives his wife into the arms of his younger brother. Western, starring Edward G Robinson, Barbara Stanwyck and Glenn Ford

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughters birth. Comedy drama, starring Kevin Hart and Alfre Woodard

Space age pilot Mills suffers a catastrophic mechanical failure at the controls of his craft and crash-lands on a mysterious planet. Armed with limited munitions, he deduces that he is stranded on Earth 65 million years ago when dinosaurs ruled the third rock from the sun. Action adventure, starring Adam Driver and Ariana Greenblatt

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Fact-based historical drama chronicling the story of the first all-black regiment to fight in the American Civil War, and the inexperienced officer given the job of training the men and leading them into battle. Starring Matthew Broderick, Cary Elwes, Morgan Freeman and Denzel Washington, who received an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: And Then We Danced
programme.desc: Merab and Irakli dance for the National Georgian Ensemble in Tbilisi. They begin a relationship, but are forced to keep it a secret because of the rigidly macho world in which they work. Drama, starring Levan Gelbakhiani and Bachi Valishvili. In Georgian with English subtitles

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: Two elderly brothers each stand to inherit a fortune if the other dies first - but one of them is not prepared to leave anything to chance, and begins a series of disastrous attempts on his unsuspecting siblings life. However, when one of the pair appears to have really died, his nephews conspire to cover it up. Black comedy, with John Mills, Ralph Richardson, Michael Caine, Peter Cook and Dudley Moore

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Veteran officer Robert Sharkey is recruited to train a team of intelligence service agents. When one of them turns out to be a German mole, Sharkey feeds him misinformation to take back to the Gestapo. However, the rogue spy outsmarts his peers and murders an agent. Without time to recruit a replacement, Sharkey steps in to head a dangerous mission in the heart of Nazi-occupied France. Second World War thriller, with James Cagney, Richard Conte, Walter Abel, Frank Latimore and Annabella

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about the making of the Cold War espionage drama

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of seafarers tries to save a derelict Victorian pier from demolition by getting it registered as a vessel. Ealing comedy, starring Alec Guinness, Irene Browne, Maurice Denham and Lionel Jeffries

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: The ruler of the Persian empire vows to expand his realm by conquering Greece. The king of Sparta steps forward to defend his homeland and the other kingdoms of Greece, but when he is betrayed by a political council, he finds himself without an army and must fend off the vast invading army with a mere 300 warriors. Historical drama, starring Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson and Diane Baker

programme.title: Daddys Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wifes two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: Unemployed Bill Baker travels from his home in Stillwater, Oklahoma to Marseille, France to visit his estranged daughter Allison, who was imprisoned five years earlier for a murder she claims she didnt commit. Confronted with an insurmountable language barrier, cross-cultural differences and maddening legal complexity, Baker decides to take matters into his own hands to exonerate his only child after failing to get Allisons case re-opened. Crime thriller, starring Matt Damon and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Not Okay
programme.desc: An ambitious but misguided young woman desperate for friends and fame fakes a visit to Paris to upscale her social media presence. A terrifying incident takes place in the real world, which becomes a part of the imaginary trip and offers all the material she wants. After posing as a survivor of a deadly attack, she soon learns that online notoriety comes with a price. Comedy drama, starring Zoey Deutch and Mia Isaac

programme.title: Second Coming
programme.desc: A happily married woman is shocked to discover she is pregnant as it has been months since she slept with her husband. Afraid of her spouses reaction, she tries to keep the news to herself, but she cannot hide the truth indefinitely. Drama, starring Nadine Marshall, Idris Elba and Kai Francis Lewis

Costume drama, starring Sophie McShera, Thomas Howes, Michelle Dockery, Iain Glen and Maria Doyle Kennedy

programme.desc: Car restorers Henry Cole and Sam Lovegrove hunt for a slice of the American Dream - a classic American pickup truck that Henry wants to use as a daily driver. The next day, he takes a food tour with Amanda Mouttaki, from Moroccan Food Adventures, and cooks a tanjia - a stew not to be confused with a tagine. When it returns to Shipton Abbott harbour several hours later, only the three fishermen remain. A note found on deck suggests the woman took her own life. As her estranged daughter comes to town to help make funeral arrangements, the simple case grows more complex. Over the years of ocean exploration, he works out where the fertile areas of the ocean are, and his journeys bring him into contact with some of the largest creatures ever to have lived. The story takes a dark turn as Ken discovers thousands of dolphins are being killed every year in the Northeast Atlantic, many of them in Irish waters

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky carries on his search for Billie, but receives an unwanted distraction when the church decides to honour him. He also faces continuing pressure from Gyp Rosetti, who is impatiently trying to make inroads into the Atlantic City liquor trade. Margaret refuses to abandon her quest to improve the treatment of female patients at the hospital, while Van Alden struggles to adjust to his new life in Chicago

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nuckys well-oiled operation is thrown into jeopardy by the death of Sheriff Victor Sickles, and his worries are only compounded when he is forced into hiding while trying to track down a precocious liquor thief. Meanwhile, Al Capone discovers his deaf son is being bullied at school, Lucky haggles with notorious New York gangster Joe Masseria, and Margaret promotes Dr Masons new womens clinic. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Scenes from a Marriage
programme.desc: Modern reimagining of Ingmar Bergmans Swedish drama from 1973 which follows the lives of a couple through the twists and turns of their marriage, from the beginning of their relationship to periods of separation and reconciliation. After a tense day of reflection and disclosure, Mira and her husband Jonathan navigate the consequences of unexpected news. Starring Oscar Isaac and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Scenes from a Marriage

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Gyp Rosettis stronghold in Tabor Heights is preventing Arnold Rothstein from receiving his liquor shipments in New York, so he heads to Atlantic City to talk things over with Nucky. As the situation escalates, Rothstein proceeds to send an unequivocal message to his rival. Nucky uses his influence to find Billie a new dance partner with star quality in the hope of reviving her faltering show, but he comes unstuck when Margaret finds out about his affair. Meanwhile in Chicago, Van Alden worries that his past as a prohibition agent will catch up with him and goes to extreme lengths to ensure his previous life remains a secret

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: After being detained in Washington DC by henchmen working for politician Harry Daugherty, Nucky comes face to face with Esther Randolph - the lawyer responsible for prosecuting him for election rigging. Later, he receives an intriguing proposition from Gaston Means, the special investigator for the Department of Justice who is acting as the middleman in Daughertys protection racket for organised crime. In Atlantic City, Margaret copes with her son Teddys demons, Owen investigates a suspicious fire and Gillian begins a feud with Lucky Luciano

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Lewis and Kellerman find themselves in the middle of a drug war when they investigate a series of murders

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven, while in the north of Westeros at Castle Black, the Nights Watch stands behind Alliser Thorne. Fantasy drama, starring Isaac Hempstead-Wright and Owen Teale

programme.desc: While Daenerys meets her future, Bran meets the past. Elsewhere, Tommen confronts the High Sparrow, and Arya continues her training. Starring Emilia Clarke, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead-Wright

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The cameras follow three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations, however, and decides to reminisce about past race days instead. The programme also meets Matt Kimble, a graduate who gave up on his plan to become a PE teacher and decided to follow his ancestors into the fishing trade instead

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul tries to persuade Sophie to open up to discuss her feelings of resentment toward her father. Gabriel Byrne and Mia Wasikowska star

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham relives its glory days by hosting a vintage ships race and heritage festival, and a local toy-shop owner faces a difficult decision

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers, he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A Trojan prince elopes with the king of Spartas wife, sparking a bitter and bloody war between a mighty alliance of Greek kings and the city of Troy, whose champion engages in intense personal conflict with the enemys most formidable warrior. Wolfgang Petersens adventure, inspired by Homers epic poem The Iliad, with Brad Pitt, Eric Bana, Orlando Bloom, Brian Cox, Sean Bean and Peter OToole

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago. Fantasy adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris and Malin Akerman

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers, he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra Cassie Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. A routine call-out almost ends in tragedy and Cassie experiences disorienting visions which suggest she is predisposed to glimpse the future and subtly alter the course of history through her actions. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. Fantasy adventure, starring Dakota Johnson, Tahar Rahim and Sydney Sweeney

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A former Marine sniper is coaxed back into action when government officials need his help to prevent an assassination attempt on the US president. However, the intended target is in fact an African archbishop, and the marksman is set up by double-crossing agents to take the fall, forcing him to go on the run as he fights to clear his name. Action thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Michael Pena and Danny Glover

programme.title: Old Guy
programme.desc: An ageing hitman must train a young prodigy when his employer moves to replace the old guard. Director Simon Wests comedy, starring Christoph Waltz, Lucy Liu and Cooper Hoffman

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert
